description: The Triton Series Madrid 2022 is a series of streamed and televised high-stakes poker tournaments held in an array of the world's most luxurious locations. It features thirteen events with buy-ins ranging from €20,000 to €150,000 and is scheduled to take place from May 13 to May 25 in Madrid, Spain.

markets.description:
The Triton Series Madrid 2022 is a series of streamed and televised high-stakes poker tournaments held in an array of the world's most luxurious locations. It features thirteen events with buy-ins ranging from €20,000 to € 150,000 and is scheduled to take place from May 13 to May 25 in Madrid, Spain. 

This market will resolve to "Yes" if at least one of the players participating in the Triton Series Madrid 2022 places 1st in more than one event. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For more info about the tournament, please visit https://triton-series.com/triton-super-high-roller-series-madrid-2022. Official information from the event's organizers will be used to resolve this market, like https://tritonpoker.plus/festival/e5d259c2-2310-44a6-ae67-8885c481833f. 

If for any reason, the tournament doesn't finish by May 31, 2022 (11 PM ET), and none of the players have won more than one of the events, this market will resolve to "No".

The series will be broadcasted at https://www.youtube.com/c/tritonpoker.
markets.groupItemTitle: Will any player win more than 1 event?
markets.question: Poker: Will any player win more than 1 event at Triton Series Madrid 2022?

markets.description:
The Triton Series Madrid 2022 is a series of streamed and televised high-stakes poker tournaments held in an array of the world's most luxurious locations. It features thirteen events with buy-ins ranging from €20,000 to € 150,000 and is scheduled to take place from May 13 to May 25 in Madrid, Spain. For more info about the tournament, please visit https://triton-series.com/triton-super-high-roller-series-madrid-2022. 

If Tom Dwan places 1st in at least one event in the Triton Series Madrid 2022, this market will resolve to "Yes". This market will resolve to "No" as soon as the tournament is completed and Tom Dwan does not win any event, or on May 31, 2022 (11 PM ET) if by then the tournament is not completed, for any reason.

Official information from the event's organizers will be used to resolve this market, like https://tritonpoker.plus/festival/e5d259c2-2310-44a6-ae67-8885c481833f. 

The series will be broadcasted at https://www.youtube.com/c/tritonpoker.

markets.description:
The Triton Series Madrid 2022 is a series of streamed and televised high-stakes poker tournaments held in an array of the world's most luxurious locations. It features thirteen events with buy-ins ranging from €20,000 to €150,000 and is scheduled to take place from May 13 to May 25 in Madrid, Spain. For more info about the tournament, please visit https://triton-series.com/triton-super-high-roller-series-madrid-2022. 

This market will resolve to "Yes" if, at any point of the tournament, a straight flush is exposed in play. Otherwise, it will resolve to "No". 

A straight flush is a type of 5-card hand in poker, that contains five cards of sequential rank, all of the same suit, and for the purposes of this market, it includes also a royal flush. Only the hands that will be exposed by players will count in this market and only if they are either on a showdown or purposely shown by a player at completion of the hand in winning the pot.

Official information from the event's organizers will be used to resolve this market, like https://tritonpoker.plus/festival/e5d259c2-2310-44a6-ae67-8885c481833f. If for any reason, the tournament doesn't finish by May 31, 2022 (11 PM ET), and conditions have not been met, this market will resolve to "No".

The series will be broadcasted at https://www.youtube.com/c/tritonpoker.

markets.question: Poker: Will any straight flush be exposed at Triton Series Madrid 2022?

markets.description:
The Triton Series Madrid 2022 is a series of streamed and televised high-stakes poker tournaments held in an array of the world's most luxurious locations. It features thirteen events with buy-ins ranging from €20,000 to € 150,000 and is scheduled to take place from May 13 to May 25 in Madrid, Spain. For more info about the tournament, please visit https://triton-series.com/triton-super-high-roller-series-madrid-2022. 

If the players from the USA place 1st in 6 or more events in the Triton Series Madrid 2022, this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No". 

Official information from the event's organizers will be used to resolve this market, like https://tritonpoker.plus/festival/e5d259c2-2310-44a6-ae67-8885c481833f. Specifically, to determine the nationality of the player, the flags next to player's name and picture will be used.

If for any reason, the tournament doesn't finish by May 31, 2022 (11 PM ET), and conditions have not been met, this market will resolve to "No".

The series will be broadcasted at https://www.youtube.com/c/tritonpoker.
